page.title: 09CHILD ACTIVITIES,BOURNE END
page.content: Out-of-school activities are games we may play which are non-club games. Tennis is popular,along with swingball, badminton,cricket,football,baseball, rounders,volleyball,squash,table tennis ,swimming,horse riding,fishing,judo, rugby,golf and quite a few others. Indoor games,such as darts,board games, snooker,cards and computer usage are popular.Gymnastics may be practised, and maybe Keep Fit.Cycling, water fights and hide-and-seek game variations are also played.Some of us go to the park and some choose to stay at home and read.Discos are enjoyed in the evening time by all ages as nearly everyone likes to dance.Some of the favourite school activities also take place out of school.
